attributes.action: stop proposal to remove Internet provision if downloading MP3s and movies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is one of the most OUTRAGEOUS proposals I've ever heard a government consider.  This is an issue for the music industry, who have for years artificially rigged the price of CDs to generate inflated profits – not for any Government to solve in this way.

This is not an issue that should be resolved in this way.  It smacks of a big brother state – the type of thing one might expect if you lived behind the old iron curtain.  It is completely outrageous to suggest that a whole household will be denied access to the net because potentially ONE person in the house may have been downloading.

This will prove to be one of the MOST UNPOPULAR things this government has ever done if it goes ahead.  IT MUST BE STOPPED.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
